channel.title: The 13th ETSF Young Researcher's Meeting
channel.description:
New frontiers in modeling electronic excited-states from confined systems to complex aggregates.
6-10/10/2016 Kings College London, London, UK

item.title: A first post
item.description:
Welcome to ETSF YRM 2016 freshly deployed website. We will try to keep you updated. To track all new you can subscribe this website to your RSS. Enjoy!

The website is orginised as follows:

  1. About
    • General information
    • What is the ETSF?
    • Previous ETSF YRMs
  2. Program
    • Speakers
    • Timetable
  3. Venue
    • The conference
    • Accomodation
  4. Registration and Fees
  5. Organisation and support
  6. Contacts
